title: Easy care rose
body: Ignore this rose...soil can be poor..but not too dry...Throw a feed on it if you remember...The reward.....amazing butter yellow golden flowers that glow ...Beautiful stamens abd light fruity scent.Must have had over 100 flowers in Spring very early flowering before any other rose....its amazing.never fails to start of my garden zing.Has been pruned from 10 ft down to 8 inches due to house renovation and has grown back as if not touched at all.A Rose for a semi shade partial sunny spot..Very thorny but tied in and shaped not a problem.
